data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Begusarai that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Begusarai, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Begusarai, Bihar, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 32,676 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 32,676 believers in the county of Begusarai the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Beldar Laria (Hindu traditions) people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Beldar Laria (Hindu traditions) people.
Spirit, teach the children in the county of Begusarai to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Begusarai, Bihar, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 2,937,824 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Begusarai access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

location.name: Begusarai
location.people_groups_list: Laheri (Muslim traditions), Bedia (Muslim traditions), Mukeri, Atishbaz, Bhakat
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Laheri (Muslim traditions) (56,000), Bedia (Muslim traditions) (4,100), Mukeri (32,000), Atishbaz (3,400), Bhakat (2,900)
